name: Pascal vs Cats
description:
The game's goal is simple - help Pascal (named after my dog) avoid the cats and collect as many treats as possible.

I made this game as an experiment by trying to use AI technology to create a fully functioning without any previous development experience by going back and forth with chatgpt and asking for code pieces to achieve each individual tasks.

Sprites are based on the work of Time Fantasy, rowdy41 and extra assets were made by @japezart.
